verses.roman:
prathamei tomā-saṅge āilā gauḍa haite
iṅhāra icchā āche 'sarva-tīrtha' karite

synonyms: prathamei—in the beginning; tomā-saṅge—with You; āilā—came; gauḍa haite—from Bengal; iṅhāra icchā—his desire; āche—is; sarva-tīrtha—all places of pilgrimage; karite—to go see.
translation: "In the beginning, he came with You from Bengal. It is his desire to see and visit all the holy places of pilgrimage.
